alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Franklin; Fulton; Huntingdon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 8:39AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN BEDFORD...SOUTH CENTRAL HUNTINGDON...FRANKLIN AND FULTON COUNTIES THROUGH 930 AM EDT... At 838 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 21 miles east of Bedford to Breezewood to 15 miles northeast of Cumberland. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chambersburg, Waynesboro, Shippensburg, Greencastle, Breezewood, Guilford, St. Thomas, Fayetteville, Warfordsburg, Wayne Heights, Clearville, Mont Alto, Mercersburg, Scotland, McConnellsburg, Harrisonville, Marion, Fort Loudon, Big Cove Tannery and Crystal Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Brief heavy downpours are also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
